inclusion.criterion: newly diagnosed women with biopsy-verified invasive breast cancer planned for breast conserving surgery
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Previous surgery for pre-malignant or malignant lesions in the breast
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: 45-year-old postmenopausal woman with cytologically confirmed breast cancer, HER2-positive and ER/PR negative, 5 positive lymph nodes, metastatic lesions on CXR.
